name: Male better upper body shots [LoRA] SFW
description:
Today I focused on male models. The goal was to have a decent upper body shot with a variety in age and location, as well as a different ethnicity.

Prompt work perfectly with no shirt for upper body, also likes shorts and jeans and sometimes creates black and white images depending on its mood.

Trigger word: bettermalebody
Sampling Method: DPM++ 2M Karras
Weight: 0.6 - 0.8
Restoring faces: weight 0.8+
